Laura Goddard

  1. Foster Name: Lucile Jean
  2. Foster Family: W. A. Chitwood
  3. Location of Family: Franklin, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Franklin, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 1908-09-26, Hermon, NY
  8. Gender: female
  9. Source: Franklin City News, 28 June 1913; OTR 606; Children's Aid Society Corres.; 1920 United States Federal Census.
